locations.name: Farmyard
locations.description: Overgrown fields surround a dilapidated farmhouse. A broken fence encloses the property.

area_0.name: Farmyard
area_0.description: Overgrown fields surround a dilapidated farmhouse. A broken fence encloses the property.

objects.name: Chopping Block
objects.description: A thick wooden stump used for splitting firewood. An axe is embedded in its surface.

objects.name: Underground Pool
objects.description: A clear pool of water fed by underground springs. The water looks fresh and clean.

objects.name: Ancient Well
objects.description: A stone-lined well with a wooden bucket on a rope. The water below looks clear.

objects.name: Collapsed Bookcase
objects.description: Various pieces of household furniture covered in dust and cobwebs.

item_drops.name: Deer Hide
item_drops.description: Soft deer hide, excellent for crafting.

objects.name: Broken Fence
objects.description: Sections of wooden fencing that have fallen into disrepair.

objects.name: Sagging Bed Frame
objects.description: Various pieces of household furniture covered in dust and cobwebs.

item_drops.name: Shortsword
item_drops.description: A light, finesse weapon perfect for quick strikes.

objects.name: Underground Pool
objects.description: A clear pool of water fed by underground springs. The water looks fresh and clean.

objects.name: Woodpile
objects.description: A neat stack of cut firewood, ready for use.

item_drops.name: Quarterstaff
item_drops.description: A quarterstaff is a simple weapon that can be used with one or two hands.

item_drops.name: Torch
item_drops.description: A wooden torch that provides light for 1 hour when lit.

item_drops.name: Bat Guano
item_drops.description: Bat droppings, useful as fertilizer or alchemical component.

item_drops.name: Firewood
item_drops.description: Dry wood suitable for burning.

item_drops.name: Dried Meat
item_drops.description: Preserved meat that provides sustenance.

item_drops.name: Preserved Food
item_drops.description: Food that has been preserved and is still edible.

item_drops.name: Dried Meat
item_drops.description: Preserved meat that provides sustenance.

objects.name: Creaking Floorboards
objects.description: Various pieces of household furniture covered in dust and cobwebs.

item_drops.name: Shortsword
item_drops.description: A light, finesse weapon perfect for quick strikes.

objects.name: Cheerful Simple Hearth
objects.description: A well-built fireplace with a cheerful fire crackling within. The flames dance warmly, casting flickering light and radiating comfortable heat.

properties.examination_text: The fire burns steadily, consuming the fuel and providing both warmth and light. The stone chimney draws the smoke upward efficiently.

entities.name: Wild Dog
entities.description: A feral dog that has reverted to its wild instincts. Its ribs show through matted fur.

locations.name: Abandoned Farmhouse
locations.description: The interior is dusty and abandoned. Furniture sits covered in cobwebs.

area_1.name: Abandoned Farmhouse
area_1.description: The interior is dusty and abandoned. Furniture sits covered in cobwebs.

objects.name: Wooden Table
objects.description: A sturdy wooden table scarred by years of use. Various items could be placed on it.

objects.name: Old Barrel
objects.description: A weathered wooden barrel that has seen better days.

properties.true_description: A weathered wooden barrel that has been cleverly modified with a false bottom. Faint scratches around the rim suggest it has been opened frequently.
properties.true_examination_text: The barrel's bottom sounds hollow when tapped, and there are tool marks around the rim indicating it has been modified for concealment.

item_drops.name: Wolf Pelt
item_drops.description: The hide of a wolf, useful for crafting leather goods.

item_drops.name: Chain Mail
item_drops.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows.

properties.true_description: A weathered wooden barrel that has been cleverly modified with a false bottom. Faint scratches around the rim suggest it has been opened frequently.
properties.true_examination_text: The barrel's bottom sounds hollow when tapped, and there are tool marks around the rim indicating it has been modified for concealment.

item_drops.name: Gold Coins
item_drops.description: Standard gold coins used as currency.

item_drops.name: Thieves' Tools
item_drops.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

item_drops.description: Glittering crystals found in deep caves.

entities.description: A feral dog that has reverted to its wild instincts. Its ribs show through matted fur.

entities.name: Giant Rat
entities.description: A rat the size of a small dog, with matted fur and glowing red eyes. It hisses menacingly.
